author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-2680: Reference manual section "Setting attributes.." lacks upgrade=true attribute

author: skitching
msg: * Move object initialisation into the constructor. This allows NEW to be used rather than a create method.
* Make createMessager method use frameworkadapter.getBean, so
(a) IOC config can define the instance to use, and
(b) the framework adapter can provide a framework-specific default.

author: skitching
msg: Fix: the getBean method should return null if the bean does not exist, rather than throw an exception.

author: skitching
msg: Implement "magic beans" in order to provide framework-specific default objects.
